review: Hospital service was very good and doctor's were very friendly and explained everything with patience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very cordial ,prompt service   and accurate service by  the supporting staff . Very nice reception as well. Dr  Vivek Sir  is very much keen in addressing the issues of each and every patient with much more patience by virtue of his vivid experience.  Very homely and friendly treatment by  the Specialist Doctors also.Very perfectly and fully equipped Dental hospital. Ambiance of the of  the hospital is very appreciable. Fully justified for what you incur. Thanks.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been visiting Dr Vivek since 20 years, apart from being friendly nature,His expertise in dentistry and excellent diagnosis attracts patient s to visit him often.Though dental treatment is expensive,He charges nominal fees.  Pray God to give renewed energy to Dr.Vivek who is always in the service of the needy

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Vivek has been amazing.  I'm writing this feedback collectively for myself and my mother's treatment done. He explained the line of treatment convincingly . Each time ,the sittings were well planned, intimated and executed smoothly be it extraction or scaling. We were well informed such that it eliminated all the fear factors. We referred quiet a lot of family members to Dr Vivek , Thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Bleeding Gums,Dental Deep Cleaning,Gum Disease Treatment/ Surgery,Loose Teeth,Receding Gums,
review: Dr. Vivek has been our family‚Äôs go-to person for dental treatments and concerns. He is a thorough professional with experience as well as access to expert advise, care and treatment. Very few doctors follow up with their patients and Dr. Vivek and his staff are thorough care givers ensuring the entire treatment and after care goes smoothly. His staff is an extension of his personal commitment toward his patients which is why timely care is a given at his practise. I and my family have been seeing him for over 10 years now and highly recommend his service if you are looking for a doctor you can trust.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Vivek, he is not only a friendly knowledgeable doctor, but he is also simple and excellent human being. He is approachable and gentle. The way he handles patient is very good. Keeps track of his patients other medical issues, follows up on their progress.  His supporting staff is efficient and friendly. They are courteous and professional. 
Would highly recommend  Dr. Vivek.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Dental Fillings,Surgical Extractions of Teeth,Cracked Teeth,Apicoectomy,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review:
I have been getting treated dy Dr. Vivek for the last 5 years due to hereditary issues of my gums and teeth. He's been a terrific doctor who had bought multiple consultants for different treatments for the best results. 
Ontime appointments and regular follow ups are taken care by the friendly staff.
I had great satisfaction of getting my treatment done under him. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor "Vivek Matmari" has taken care of me like his own sister. He has been following up with me with my oral health and symptoms. I have taken treatment from Dr. Vivek Matmari, Dr. Kireeti, Dr. Narendra, Dr. Ravi and all of them have treated me like their family member and helped me with RootCanal treatment with utmost care
